Dear Kerbals,

I would like to share with u my feelling about current scienece and carrier mode. First of i like it.

But then i disslike that science components are SOOOOO small and u can put all those stuff so easly and they dont give any disadvantages for now, would like to see them bigger and with some actual weight.

I would like to see more science components as well. Next one is that u can repeat science with one ship for example as low orbit of mun until it wont give u any more science, i truly disslike that it kind of brakes all the fun. I think it would be much more fun when having a "few science components" on one ship would be max or they would just have a bigger weight so it would be harder to have all of them on one ship.

Well, I guess a thermometer is pretty small

I'd like to see them implement some science components that give you science over time.

For example, science labs that you can put on space stations that, when manned by a kerbal, generate x science per day / week / month

And telescopes - visible, Ir, uv, etc
